Proxy.name: CGALAbstractUVParametrization
Proxy.Documentation: Abstract class that should not be used directly.

IntVectorProperty.name: ScalingMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: A manual scaling mode will give you the option to scale the surface according to a multiplier. Automatic scaling will force the surface area of the output to match the surface area of the input.

Documentation.long_help: Applies an ARAP UV Parametrization on a polygonal mesh.
Documentation.short_help: Applies an ARAP UV Parametrization on a polygonal mesh.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Lambda
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Parameter to give importance to shape or angle preservation.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Tolerance
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Minimal energy difference between two iterations for the minimization process to continue.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaximumNumberOfIterations
IntVectorProperty.label: Maximum Number Of Iterations
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Maximal number of iterations in the energy minimization process.

IntVectorProperty.name: SkipPostprocess
IntVectorProperty.label: Skip Postprocess
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Removes postprocess of ARAP parametrization. Helpful when unwrap result has overlaps.

Documentation.long_help: Applies a LSCM UV Parametrization on a polygonal mesh.
Documentation.short_help: Applies a LSCM UV Parametrization on a polygonal mesh.

Documentation.long_help: Applies a boolean operation on two PolyData inputs.
Documentation.short_help: Applies a boolean operation on two PolyData inputs.

IntVectorProperty.name: Mode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates which mode will be used.

IntVectorProperty.name: SkipPreconditions
IntVectorProperty.label: Skip Preconditions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Removes precondition checking

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeSurfaceIntersection
IntVectorProperty.label: Compute Surface Intersection
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Calculates surface intersection between both inputs.

Documentation.long_help: Applies a 2d boolean operation on sets of PolyLine inputs.
Documentation.short_help: Applies a 2d boolean operation on sets of PolyLine inputs.

IntVectorProperty.name: OperationMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates which operation mode will be used.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComplementOf
IntVectorProperty.label: Complement Of
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Apply a complement on an input

IntVectorProperty.name: Plane
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property which plane to consider

StringVectorProperty.name: PwhIdArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the Polygon With Holes Id Array Name

IntVectorProperty.name: OneCell
IntVectorProperty.label: One Cell
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If true, every polygon will be composed of one cell.

Documentation.long_help: Orders a polygon clockwise or counterclockwise.
Documentation.short_help: Orders a polygon clockwise or counterclockwise.

InputProperty.name: InputPolyLine
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the PolyLine A data set.

IntVectorProperty.name: Plane
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property which plane to consider

IntVectorProperty.name: InvertPolyLineOrientation
IntVectorProperty.label: Invert PolyLine Orientation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Inverts the PolyLine A orientation

IntVectorProperty.name: ForcePolyLineOrientation
IntVectorProperty.label: Force PolyLine Orientation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Forces the PolyLine A orientation

IntVectorProperty.name: PolyLineOrientation
IntVectorProperty.label: Orientation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the orientation to force

Documentation.long_help: Classifies sets of points by checking if it's inside, outside or on the boundary of a polygon set.
Documentation.short_help: Classifies sets of points by checking if it's inside, outside or on the boundary of a polygon set.

IntVectorProperty.name: Plane
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property which plane to consider

StringVectorProperty.name: PwhIdArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the Polygon With Holes Id Array Name

StringVectorProperty.name: OrientedSideArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the array storing the oriented side results. -1 for outside, 0 for boundary and +1 for inside.

Proxy.name: CGALPolygonMeshSmoothingOperator
Proxy.label: Smoothing Operator #1

Documentation.short_help: Smooths a triangulated region of a polydata by attempting to make the triangle angle and area distributions as uniform as possible by moving non-constrained vertices.
Documentation.long_help: Smooths a triangulated region of a polydata by attempting to make the triangle angle and area distributions as uniform as possible by moving non-constrained vertices. Constraints are determined by the chosen dihedral angle of the edges. Angle-based smoothing does not change the combinatorial information of the mesh. Area-based smoothing might change the combinatorial information, unless specified otherwise.

Proxy.Documentation:
It is also possible to make the smoothing algorithm "safer" by rejecting moves that, when applied, would worsen the quality of the mesh, e.g. that would decrease the value of the smallest angle around a vertex or create self-intersections.
To use the area-based smoothing, Ceres needs to be binded to the CGAL library. This implies the need to also bind LAPACK and BLAS.

InputProperty.name: Mesh
InputProperty.Documentation: Interior surface part of the bounding domain.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseAngleSmoothing
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Angle Smoothing
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If true, angle-based smoothing will be used.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseAreaSmoothing
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Area Smoothing
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If true, area-based smoothing will be used. Requires linking to Ceres library to work.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfIterations
IntVectorProperty.label: Number of Iterations
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Number of smoothing iterations

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DihedralAngleEdgeConstraint
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Dihedral Angle Edge Constraint
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Dihedral Angle under which satisfying edges will be constrained.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseSafetyConstraints
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Safety Constraints
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If true, vertex moves that would worsen the mesh are ignored.

IntVectorProperty.name: ProjectPointsOntoSurface
IntVectorProperty.label: Project Points Onto Surface
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If true, points are projected onto the initial surface after each iteration.

Documentation.short_help: Generates a polyhedral mesh inside a bounding polyhedron domain.
Documentation.long_help: Generates a polyhedral mesh inside a bounding polyhedron domain under a set of features given by a polyhedral surface.

InputProperty.name: Interior Surfaces
InputProperty.Documentation: Interior surface part of the bounding domain.

InputProperty.name: Bounding Domain
InputProperty.Documentation: Bounding box defining the polyhedral domain.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: EdgeSize
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Edge Size
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This constant is used as an upper bound for the distance between two protecting ball centers that are consecutive on a 1-feature. This parameter has to be set to a positive value when 1-dimensional features protection is used.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: FacetAngle
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Facet Angle

DoubleVectorProperty.name: FacetSize
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Facet Size
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This parameter controls the size of surface facets. Each surface facet has a surface Delaunay ball which is a ball circumscribing the surface facet and centered on the surface patch. The parameter facet_size is providing an upper bound for the radii of surface Delaunay balls.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: FacetDistance
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Facet Distance
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This parameter controls the approximation error of boundary and subdivision surfaces. It provides an upper bound for the distance between the circumcenter of a surface facet and the center of a surface Delaunay ball of this facet.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CellRadiusEdgeRatio
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Cell Radius to Edge Ratio
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This parameter controls the shape of mesh cells (but can't filter slivers, as we discussed earlier). It is an upper bound for the ratio between the circumradius of a mesh tetrahedron and its shortest edge. There is a theoretical bound for this parameter: the Delaunay refinement process is guaranteed to terminate for values of cell_radius_edge_ratio bigger than 2.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CellSize
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Cell Size
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This scalar parameter controls the size of mesh tetrahedra. It provides an upper bound on the circumradii of the mesh tetrahedra.

IntVectorProperty.name: TopologicalStructure
IntVectorProperty.label: Topological Structure
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specifies the manifold of the interior surfaces

IntVectorProperty.name: ConfineSurfacePoints
IntVectorProperty.label: Confine Surface Points
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If true, every point of the interior surface will be part of the tetrahedral mesh output. If false, the default behavior is applied.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseCustomSizingField
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Custom Sizing Field
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If true, a sizing field is used for very precise meshing definition

IntVectorProperty.name: Lloyd
IntVectorProperty.label: Lloyd
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Activates/deactivates the Lloyd smoother.

IntVectorProperty.name: Odt
IntVectorProperty.label: ODT
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Activates/deactivates the ODT smoother.

IntVectorProperty.name: Perturb
IntVectorProperty.label: Perturbate
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Activates/deactivates the perturber.

IntVectorProperty.name: Exude
IntVectorProperty.label: Exude
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Activates/deactivates the exuder.

SourceProxy.name: CGALPolygonSetOrientedSideClassifier
SourceProxy.label: CGAL Polygon Set Oriented Side Classifier

Documentation.long_help: Classifies sets of points by checking if it's inside, outside or on the boundary of a polygon set.
Documentation.short_help: Classifies sets of points by checking if it's inside, outside or on the boundary of a polygon set.

SourceProxy.name: IsotropicRemeshingFilter
SourceProxy.label: CGAL Isotropic Remeshing
SourceProxy.Documentation: This filter will remesh the given data set. It takes a PolyData as input, and returns a PolyData containing the remeshed input. An optional input array can be supplied to mask the remeshing zone.

StringVectorProperty.name: MeshingMaskArrayName
StringVectorProperty.label: Meshing Mask
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Specifies the meshing mask array name.

IntVectorProperty.name: ProtectConstraints
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggles border constraints protection. The boundary edges will be considered as constrained and protected.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TargetEdgeLength
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The target length for the new edges of the mesh (default is 1% of the bounding box diagonal).

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfIterations
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The number of iterations for the sequence of atomic operations performed (edge splits, edge collapses, edge flips, tangential relaxation and projection to the initial surface to generate a smooth mesh with a prescribed edge length).

IntVectorProperty.name: Kernel
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the kernel. Depending on the CGAL kernel used, the compute time may very a lot and so the output regions.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaxDistanceToPlane
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The maximum distance from the furthest face vertex to a plane.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaxAcceptedAngle
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The maximum accepted angle between the face normal and the normal of a plane.

IntVectorProperty.name: MinRegionSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The minimum number of mesh faces a region must have.
